content: 🦴 loyal puppy 🐾 knitting pattern by amanda berry email fluffandfuzz@googlemail com 🐶 website fluffandfuzz@weebly com yarn needles & notions - loyal puppy was knitted in 100% acrylic yarn less - a pair of 3mm us 2 5 single pointed needles than 30g in a brown shade you will also need a minimum length 20cm few metres in blue and black yarns for the collar - a darning or tapestry needle for seaming and nose - several handfuls of toy filling - the puppy photographed was knitted in a yarn - two 6mm toy safety eyes that has since been discontinued recommended substitutes are paintbox yarns simply dk and stylecraft special dk both are dk weight copyright © 2018 amanda berry double knitting light worsted weight 8-ply this free pattern is for personal use only not for resale 100% acrylic yarns available in a wide range of all patterns designed by amanda berry are protected by colours international copyright laws any unauthorised copying sharing or reselling will constitute an infringement of copyright -
